columns.name: name
columns.description: The name assigned to an on-premises server or virtual machine (VM) when it is activated as a Systems Manager managed instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the instance.

columns.name: resource_type
columns.description: The type of instance. Instances are either EC2 instances or managed instances.

columns.name: activation_id
columns.description: The activation ID created by Systems Manager when the server or VM was registered.

columns.name: agent_version
columns.description: The version of SSM Agent running on your Linux instance.

columns.name: computer_name
columns.description: The fully qualified host name of the managed instance.

columns.name: ip_address
columns.description: The IP address of the managed instance.

columns.name: is_latest_version
columns.description: Indicates whether the latest version of SSM Agent is running on your Linux Managed Instance.

columns.name: last_association_execution_date
columns.description: The date the association was last run.

columns.name: last_ping_date_time
columns.description: The date and time when the agent last pinged the Systems Manager service.

columns.name: last_successful_association_execution_date
columns.description: The last date the association was successfully run.

columns.name: platform_name
columns.description: The name of the operating system platform running on your instance.

columns.name: platform_version
columns.description: The version of the OS platform running on your instance.

columns.name: registration_date
columns.description: The date the server or VM was registered with AWS as a managed instance.
